session_info.name: THYB - Invited Oral Presentations, Accelerator Technology

papers.title: Review of Permanent Magnet Technology for Accelerators
authors: Permanent magnets can provide many opportunities for accelerators in terms of energy and cost savings

and could significantly simplify their infrastructure. The recent developments in tunability could considerably widen their range of applications. I will review the recent advancements in materials and designs
and will give a perspective on future areas of applications.
